subject: Languages
title: Gallaudet University: The World's Only Deaf University
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Gallaudet University: The World's Only Deaf University.

hook.text: The only university in the world designed entirely for deaf students was chartered by Abraham Lincoln.

buildup.text: Gallaudet University in Washington, DC, was founded in 1864 and teaches all courses in ASL.

discovery.text: It has produced deaf doctors, lawyers, scientists, and artists for over 160 years.

twist.text: In 1988, students protested and demanded the first deaf president â€” and won. It changed deaf rights.

climax.text: The 'Deaf President Now' protest proved deaf people could lead their own institutions.

punchline.text: Lincoln signed a university into existence. Its students sign everything else.

quiz.question: What was the 'Deaf President Now' protest about?
options: Students demanded Gallaudet's first deaf president
